abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn and Lions Gate Entertainment have reportedly held talks about awarding him board seats and ending his hostile takeover bid for the film studio.
snippet: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn and Lions Gate Entertainment have reportedly held talks about awarding him board seats and ending his hostile takeover bid for the film studio.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn and Lions Gate Entertainment have held talks about awarding him board seats and ending his hostile takeover bid for the film studio, Bloomberg News reports, citing two people with the knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: Icahn Reported in Talks With Lions Gate to End Bid
